title: The Medallion
description: The 3rd installment in The Bernovem Chronicles is here!This time Kristina has stayed in the magical land to accompany Hector Mysteria in his search for the wizard, Azaril Crimson, who has hidden Bernovem’s Book of Prophecy in the forsaken land of Jalmara.Sentiz is also back and on the hunt for a key item―the Medallion. She’ll need it in order to cast her final spell to rule Bernovem.Kristina will soar high above the land and sea on a dragon's back, and she'll encounter someone in Bernovem she never imagined meeting.
author: Victoria Simcox
